name: Athesense Suites
description: Set in Athens, 600 metres from Temple of Olympion Zeus, Athesense Suites offers accommodation with a fitness centre, free private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace. Each accommodation at the 4-star hotel has city views, and guests can enjoy access to an outdoor swimming pool. The property is 1.4 km from the city centre and 600 metres from Acropolis Museum. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a microwave, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. At Athesense Suites all rooms come with bed linen and towels. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Akropolis Metro Station, Syngrou/Fix Metro Station and Neos Kosmos Metro Station. The nearest airport is Eleftherios Venizelos Airport, 31 km from Athesense Suites.

name: Alkima Athens Hotel
description: Alkima Athens Hotel has an outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, a terrace and bar in Athens. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service and a concierge service. The property is 600 metres from Monastiraki Metro Station, and within 1 km of the city centre. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. At Alkima Athens Hotel all rooms include bed linen and towels. A continental breakfast is available every morning at the accommodation. Popular points of interest near Alkima Athens Hotel include Monastiraki Railway Station, Monastiraki Square and Omonia Square. The nearest airport is Eleftherios Venizelos, 33 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Lux&easy Signature Syngrou 234
description: Featuring a fitness centre, LUX&EASY Signature Syngrou 234 is situated in the Kallithea district of Athens, 2.6 km from Stavros Niarchos Foundation Cultural Center and 2.8 km from Filopappos Hill. Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the property and private parking is available on site. Every unit has a private bathroom and shower, air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and a fridge. Some units have a terrace and/or a balcony with city views. Syngrou/Fix Metro Station is 3.7 km from the aparthotel, while Neos Kosmos Metro Station is 3.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Eleftherios Venizelos Airport, 35 km from LUX&EASY Signature Syngrou 234.

name: Ethereal Athens
description: Located in Athens, 200 metres from the centre and 100 metres from Ermou Street-Shopping Area, Ethereal Athεns provides accommodation with amenities like free WiFi and flat-screen TV. There is a private bathroom with walk-in shower in every unit, along with slippers, a hair dryer and free toiletries. Popular points of interest near the aparthotel include Monastiraki Square, National Garden and Monastiraki Railway Station. The nearest airport is Eleftherios Venizelos, 32 km from Ethereal Athεns, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Pame Wild
description: Situated conveniently in the centre of Athens, PAME Wild offers air-conditioned rooms, a shared lounge, free WiFi and a terrace. This property is set a short distance from attractions such as National Theatre of Greece, University of Athens - Central Building, and Omonia Square. The accommodation features a shared kitchen, a concierge service and luggage storage for guests. At the hotel, rooms are fitted with a wardrobe. Featuring a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries, certain units at PAME Wild also have a city view. At the accommodation all rooms come with bed linen and towels. You can play billiards at PAME Wild, and bike hire and car hire are available. Languages spoken at the 24-hour front desk include Greek, English, French and Italian. Popular points of interest near the hotel include National Archaeological Museum of Athens, Omonia Metro Station and Larissis Railway Station. The nearest airport is Eleftherios Venizelos, 27 km from PAME Wild, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Neoma
description: Conveniently situated in Athens, Neoma provides air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, free private parking and room service. 700 metres from Odeum of Herodes Atticus and 500 metres from Syngrou/Fix Metro Station, the property offers a garden and a bar. The hotel has a fitness centre, seasonal outdoor pool and terrace, and guests can enjoy a meal at the restaurant. Guest rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, minibar, a coffee machine, a shower, free toiletries and a desk. Each room comes with a private bathroom with a hairdryer, while certain rooms include a balcony and others also offer city views. At the hotel every room comes with bed linen and towels. A continental, vegetarian or vegan breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Speaking German, Greek, English and Italian at the reception, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical guidance on the area. Popular points of interest near Neoma include Filopappos Hill, Acropolis Museum and Akropolis Metro Station. The nearest airport is Eleftherios Venizelos, 32 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: President Hotel
description: Located in the heart of Athens and 500 metres from Panormou Metro Station, President Hotel offers comfortable accommodation and a beautiful rooftop terrace with a seasonal swimming pool. President provides spacious stylishly decorated rooms, most boasting lovely views of Athens. They are equipped with air conditioning, satellite TV, refrigerator and safety box. Guests can have their drink at Penthouse 21, the minimally decorated rooftop pool bar enjoying panoramic views of the city. You may enjoy a coffee or taste the daily set menu at the Avenue Bar on the ground floor. The restaurant of the hotel serves a variety of Greek and international dishes. President Hotel has 8 renovated and fully equipped conference rooms, which can accommodate business events. Hotel President is conveniently situated in Kifissias Avenue with easy access to shops, museums and archaeological sites.

name: Nyx Esperia Palace Hotel Athens By Leonardo Hotels
description: Conveniently situated in Athens, NYX Esperia Palace Hotel Athens by Leonardo Hotels provides a buffet breakfast and free WiFi. Providing a restaurant, the property also has a terrace, as well as a sauna and a hot tub. The property features a seasonal outdoor pool, indoor pool, fitness centre and shared lounge. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. The rooms have a kettle, while certain rooms include a balcony and others also offer city views. At NYX Esperia Palace Hotel Athens by Leonardo Hotels each room comes with bed linen and towels. Speaking Greek, English, Spanish and Italian, staff at the 24-hour front desk can help you plan your stay. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Ermou Street-Shopping Area, Syntagma Metro Station and Syntagma Square. The nearest airport is Eleftherios Venizelos, 31 km from NYX Esperia Palace Hotel Athens by Leonardo Hotels, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Grand Hyatt Athens
description: Grand Hyatt Athens, opened in August 2018, boasts a brand new spa, atrium pool & bar and a rooftop with stunning views over the Acropolis. It features air-conditioned accommodation with elegant furnishings and modern technologies. Facilities include a fitness & spa center and a restaurant. Fitted with contemporary art pieces, each room and suite at Grand Hyatt Athens features a 55" flat-screen TV, work desk and minibar. Each comprises a marble bathroom along with free toiletries, bathrobes and hairdryer. A safe and a 24-hour room service are also included. A laptop is provided upon availability. Extra towels are provided upon request at no extra charge. Guests may taste Mediterranean and Asian cuisine at the on-site restaurants and sip signature cocktails at the stylish pool bar or lobby bar. Early breakfast is offered, while a breakfast box can be provided. The on-site fitness centre is accessible 24/7. Grand Hyatt also boasts a business centre and meeting rooms with state-of-the-art technologies, ideal for private or corporate events. Porterage and turn-down services are included. Athens centre is just a short drive away, while Piraeus Port is a 20-minute drive away. The world-renowned Acropolis is at 3 km. Athens International Airport lies within 32 km of Grand Hyatt Athens.

name: Athens 1890 Hotel & Spa
description: On the outside, a neoclassical architectural jewel. Inside, a combination of comfort and minimalist aesthetics. A pairing whose fascinating differences make it unpretentiously distinctive. Athens 1890 Hotel & Spa, apart from setting its own tone in the Greek capital’s hospitality, is also the ideal starting point for exploring it: from Eirinis Square, an Athenian corner with its own pulse, it is 300 meters from Monastiraki Square and only a 10-minute walk from Syntagma and Ermou Street, the commercial heart of the city. However, if you decide to spend the day indoors, we have made sure that our facilities and flavors will accompany every moment in an ideal way. From the indoor pool and sauna to the à la carte breakfast served in the rooms and the Omnivore restaurant menu, everything is designed to offer more than just a unique hospitality experience: an amalgam of history and stories in the heart of a city where both can be found in abundance. Use of Spa Area All the reservations include a 30’ minutes complimentary entrance (only once) in Spa Area, more specifically for the pool, the sauna and the steam room. Also we provide a -15% discount in massage service, if it is cοmbined with the complimentary. These services are available upon availability and upon request.

name: Perianth Hotel
description: Centrally located in Athens, just a 5-minute walk from Monastiraki Square, Perianth Hotel offers elegantly decorated rooms and suites with free WiFi access. Hip bars, stylish restaurants and a variety of shops can be found just steps away from the property. Roman Agora is 500 metres away. Combining a retro-style decor with modern touches, every room and suite at Perianth comes with a work desk and a modern bathroom with black marble details. Each unit includes a flat-screen TV, a coffee machine, a safe and a wardrobe. Some units open to a balcony and some offer views over the Acropolis. Guests can start their day with a buffet breakfast served daily at the property. Room service is also available. The Acropolis Rock is 1 km from Perianth Hotel, while the Acropolis Museum is 1.5 km away. Ermou Shopping Street can be reached within a 5-minute walk. The nearest airport is Elefthérios Venizélos Airport, 37 km from the property.

name: Electra Palace Athens
description: With a great location in the centre of Plaka, facing the Acropolis, this 5-star hotel offers personalised service, a beautiful rooftop pool and well-appointed rooms with a buffet breakfast included. Electra Palace Hotel Athens is within walking distance from most of Athens' main attractions. Syntagma Square is less than 5 minutes' walk away and the parliament and shopping districts are nearby. The spacious rooms are equipped with air conditioning and satellite TV. Thoughtful touches also include bathrobes and slippers. Some rooms offer direct views of the Acropolis. Guests can start their day with Greek Breakfast provided in the dining area. Electra Palace Hotel's rooftop has a lovely pool area and a restaurant serving Mediterranean cuisine. The restaurant's terrace looks directly to the Acropolis. The helpful staff at Electra Palace is happy to offer local information and advice. Guests can also make use of the hotel's spa facilities, including an indoor pool and sauna.

name: The Stanley
description: Conveniently located in Athens city centre and just steps from Metaxourgeio Metro Station, Stanley Hotel features a rooftop pool, 2 restaurants and 2 bars, including an open-air bar on the rooftop. It offers air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi, and a 24-hour front desk. Featuring modern decoration and earthy colours, the rooms at the Stanley Hotel offer a satellite TV and a balcony. Each has a private bathroom with toiletries and hairdryer. Some enjoy views of the Acropolis. Room service is open daily from 06:30am-01:30am. Specializing in Greek cuisine, Icarus Restaurant serves breakfast, lunch and dinner. The rooftop restaurant serves Mediterranean and Greek cuisine and features panoramic views over the city, the Acropolis and Lycabettus Hill. Guests can relax on the furnished rooftop terrace at the pool featuring views of the Acropolis. Additionally, they can enjoy a cocktail at the adjacent bar area offering a 360° view over Athens. Ermou shopping street is 1 km from the Stanley, while the Acropolis Museum is just a 5-minute metro ride. Guests have access to many beaches within a 30-minute drive. Stanley is located outside the traffic restriction ring of Athens, with a very easy access to National Roads. Athens International Airport is 36 km away. Private parking at extra charge is possible on site.

name: Radisson Blu Park Hotel Athens
description: Facing Pedion Areos Park, Radisson Blu Park Hotel Athens is located just 400 metres from the Archaeological Museum of Athens and a 5-minute walk from Victoria Metro Station. Its rooftop swimming pool operates on a seasonal basis and offers views over the Acropolis and Lycabettus Hill. A fitness centre, a sauna and a hammam are available free of charge. The rooms at Radisson Blu Park Hotel Athens boast sophisticated urban design and come equipped with a work desk, a mini bar, a safe and a Plasma TV. The bathrooms include a hairdryer and free toiletries. Most units offer views to the park and some to the Acropolis. Guests can start their day with a buffet breakfast which also includes fresh omelettes prepared on the spot upon request. A grab-and-run breakfast including coffee and tea, fresh fruits and energy bars, is also available between 05:00 and 06:30. The Oak Room Café serves a variety of coffees, teas, drinks and snacks, while the all-day Gallo Nero Restaurant serves Italian dishes during lunch and dinner. St Astra East Rooftop restaurant and bar offers panoramic views of the city lights. Syntagma Square is 2.5 km from Radisson Blu Park Hotel Athens, while the commercial district of Athens can be reached within a 15-minute walk. The New Acropolis Museum is at a distance of 3 km. Eleftherios Venizelos Airport is 36 km from the hotel. Private parking is possible on site at an extra charge.

name: Athens Capital Hotel - MGallery Collection
description: With classic chic and attentive service, Athens Capital Center Hotel MGallery Collection ensures your stay in this ancient city is unforgettable. From its rooftop terrace and pool, sip a house cocktail as you soak in one of Athens's most enchanting views of the Acropolis. Savour the best of Mediterranean cuisine at the hotel's restaurant or unwind with a drink in its cultured Galerié Café to admire fine art. Enter an oasis of modern, understated elegance in the heart of one of the world's oldest cities.accorhotels.com

name: Athens Marriott Hotel
description: The Athens Marriott hotel is located on the bustling artery of Syngrou Avenue, within walking distance of the Stavros Niarchos Foundation Cultural Centre and the Athenian Riviera.Designed to perfection, our rooms and suites, are outfitted with contemporary decor and plush bedding, spa inspired bathrooms and modern workspaces. M Club rooms afford guests access to the M Club, the perfect space to recharge. Stay active in our well-equipped fitness centre or recharge your body and soul with our signature spa treatments. Take your seat in The Great Room or join us outdoors in the Atrium and relax in to the chic, urban setting. Indulge in Mediterranean flavours at the Made in Athens restaurant and surround yourself with impeccable views on the e&o Athens rooftop while relaxing with a cocktail and savouring delicious fusion cuisine. Do business in style in our sophisticated spaces where our on site planners and culinary team will take your event to the next level, ensuring you a memorable experience.Marriott

name: Praxitelous Luxury Suites
description: Situated conveniently in Athens, Praxitelous Luxury Suites offers a continental breakfast and free WiFi throughout the property. The property is situated 400 metres from Ermou Street-Shopping Area, 600 metres from Syntagma Metro Station and 500 metres from Syntagma Square. The property is allergy-free and is set 600 metres from Monastiraki Square. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. Praxitelous Luxury Suites features certain units that feature a terrace, and rooms include a kettle. At the accommodation all rooms come with bed linen and towels. The area is popular for cycling, and bike hire and car hire are available at Praxitelous Luxury Suites. Speaking Greek, English and Russian, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical information on the area at the 24-hour front desk. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Monastiraki Railway Station, Monastiraki Metro Station and Omonia Square. The nearest airport is Eleftherios Venizelos Airport, 32 km from Praxitelous Luxury Suites.

name: Semiramis
description: Facing a tranquil green park in the Kifissia area of north Athens, the boutique hotel Semiramis is the creation of designer, Karim Rashid. Member of Design Hotels worldwide, the Semiramis ideally combines design, comfort and functionality. Works from the owner’s extensive art collection including pieces by Jeff Koons, Sue Webster and Tim Noble can be viewed at the Semiramis’ bi-annually rotating exhibition in public hotel spaces. All its guestrooms and public areas carry Rashid's distinctive signature. Light pinks and greens, oranges and subtle yellows are reproduced in walls, floors, furnishings and fittings for an energetic atmosphere. Semiramis' global guests may stay in touch with the world or the office - internet TVs complete with cordless keyboards come as standard. The hotel's two-level restaurant and bar, serve contemporary Greek, European and international flavours. The Semiraris is right on Kefalari Square, 5 minutes from Kifissia. It is 10 minutes from the business centre of Marousi and 30 minutes from the centre of Athens.

name: Melia Athens
description: Located just a short walk from Athens’ attractions, luxurious 4-star hotel Melia Athens features a rooftop restaurant with stunning views of the Acropolis. All guests enjoy free access to its health club, the seasonal outdoor pool and the hot tub. Guest rooms are soundproofed and air-conditioned. Feature a minibar, satellite TV and marble bathrooms with jet shower cabins. Free 3Mps WiFi access, is provided throughout. On the top floor, is located the air-conditioned health club, which includes a sauna and Turkish steam baths, complimentary for our guests. There is also a fully equipped fitness centre. A seasonal outdoor pool and a seasonal outdoor hot tub are also provided. The property facilities include restaurants serving International flavours, cocktails and drinks. The nearest metro station is Omonia square, at 200 meters (5 minutes walk). Melia Athens Hotel offers a variety of dining and entertainment options. Sky Lounge Rooftop Dining Bar, operates mid- April to mid- November, weather permitted, depending on Hotel’s management decision. It is located on the 9th floor, offering Greek modern cuisine and spectacular views.

name: Coco-Mat Athens Jumelle
description: COCO-MAT Athens Jumelle has a restaurant, fitness centre, a bar and garden in Athens. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and room service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel features family rooms. The rooms are fitted with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kettle, a shower, a hairdryer and a desk. At the hotel, rooms have a private bathroom with free toiletries. Guests at COCO-MAT Athens Jumelle can enjoy a buffet breakfast. The accommodation offers 5-star accommodation with a spa centre and terrace. Guests can swim in the indoor pool or use the business centre that offers printing, copying and fax services. Popular points of interest near COCO-MAT Athens Jumelle include Benaki Museum, Museum of Cycladic Art and Syntagma Square. The nearest airport is Elefthérios Venizélos Airport, 18 km from the hotel.

name: Dusit Suites Athens
description: Facilities and services include 24hr reception, internet access, concierge facilities, elevator, laundry facilities, dry cleaning, spa facilities, sauna, swimming pool, bar and restaurant.Rooms feature internet access, mini bar, safe, cable/satellite TV, desk, balcony, coffee/tea making facilities and hairdryer.Please note that some of the above facilities may be closed due to weather / seasonal conditions.Address: Lazaraki 42 & Pandoras 3, Glyfada, Athens, 16674 Greece.Sembo

name: Acropolis Hill
description: The newly built Acropolis Hill is the most recent gem of the Tour Hotel Group, in the area around Acropolis. It is located near the impeccable new Acropolis Museum and the historical centre of Athens. The hotel has an outdoor swimming pool. The stylish and contemporary guest rooms feature wooden floors and comfortable beds. Wi-Fi is free and available throughout the premises. Some rooms feature Acropolis views. Guests enjoy great views of the Acropolis, the Filopapou Hill, the sea, and across the city of Athens from the communal roof terrace, located on the 5th floor. An on-site restaurant is also included and American buffet breakfast is served daily. Just a short walk from the hotel guests can visit Plaka, Syntagma, Monastiraki and other various Athenian places of interest. It is easily accessible by Syngrou-Fix subway and tram stop or by bus.

name: Crowne Plaza Athens - City Centre
description: A modern hotel in the heart of ancient Athens Nestled in the heart of Athens, the Crowne Plaza Athens - City Centre hotel offers easy access to the city's ancient sites, including the Acropolis complex and nearby Acropolis Museum. Our location just a short walk from the Megaro Moussikis metro station means you can easily explore all that Athens has to offer, from the historic Syntagma Square to the trendy boutiques of Kolonaki. With 14 high-tech function spaces, our hotel is the perfect choice for business travellers, offering meeting rooms that can accommodate up to 430 people. Our Crowne Plaza Meetings Director is on hand to ensure that your event is a success. Our hotel also offers a range of amenities designed to make your stay as comfortable and convenient as possible. Enjoy complimentary WiFi throughout the hotel, as well as soundproof rooms with digital media hubs and LCD TVs. Our Sleep Advantage® programme, which includes soft bedding and Quiet Zones, will help ensure you get a peaceful night's sleep. Start your day with an American breakfast buffet in our elegant Ambrosia Restaurant, which offers great views of the city. In the evening, dine on seasonal Greek and international cuisine, and relax over drinks in our plush Nectar Bar. And with our rooftop garden featuring a seasonal restaurant and pool, you can enjoy stunning views of Athens while dining or lounging by the pool.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Electra Metropolis
description: Located in the heart of Athens, just 200 metres from Syntagma Square, the modern Electra Metropolis boasts a small, rooftop pool with waterfall effect, and a sun terrace with views over the city. Gourmet dishes and refreshing cocktails can be enjoyed at the top-floor restaurant or at the M Bar offering panoramic views over the Acropolis. The elegant rooms and suites at Electra Metropolis feature modern decor, wooden floors and warm tones. Each includes a marble-tiled bathroom with hairdryer, bathrobes, slippers and organic KORRES toiletries. A work desk, 40'' Smart TV with satellite channels, a laptop safe and a mini bar are standard. Free WiFi access is provided throughout. A retro-style lounge area, where guests can enjoy a coffee or a drink, is featured at the unique sky-light atrium decorated with Fassianos artwork and located at the center of the building. Guests can also taste Mediterranean flavours at the ground-floor bistro featuring an open kitchen. Extra services include a 24-hour front desk and room service. Restaurants, bars and shops can be found just steps from Electra Metropolis, while the scenic Plaka area can be reached within a 10-minute walk. The nearest airport is Eleftherios Venizelos Airport, 34 km from the property.

name: Novus City Hotel
description: The 4-star Novus City Hotel offers comfort and convenience whether you're on business or holiday in Athens. The hotel has everything you need for a comfortable stay. To be found at the hotel are free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour front desk, 24-hour room service, luggage storage, Wi-Fi in public areas. Television LCD/plasma screen, internet access – wireless, internet access – wireless (complimentary), air conditioning, heating can be found in selected guestrooms. To enhance guests' stay, the hotel offers recreational facilities such as outdoor pool. Novus City Hotel is an excellent choice from which to explore Athens or to simply relax and rejuvenate.Agoda

name: The Dolli at Acropolis
description: We could go Parthenon (and on) about the views from the Dolli, which we guarantee will elicit a wax-lyrical reaction every time the Acropolis comes into sight. References to this neoclassical, listed mansion’s fabric-shop origins have been woven throughout the interiors, while keeping the palette light, bright, and mostly white. The neutrality inside directs your gaze to the ancient beauty outside, which is best admired from the hotel’s landmark-revealing rooftop, which spotlights one of the seven wonders of the world. Mr & Mrs Smith

name: Athens Coast Hotel
description: Located in the heart of Glyfada shopping district, Athens coast hotel boasts an outdoor heated swimming pool and an a la carte restaurant, as well as free WiFi throughout. Guests will find upscale restaurants and bars within 200 metres of the property, while the tram connecting to Athens centre stops just 100 metres away. Guest rooms in the hotel are fitted with a kettle. All rooms come with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. A buffet breakfast is served each morning at the property. Staff at the reception can assist guests at any time of the day. Moorings Bar-Restaurant is 7 km from Athens Coast Hotel. The nearest airport is Elefthérios Venizélos Airport, 19 km from the accommodation.

name: Divani Palace Acropolis
description: Featuring breathtaking views of the Acropolis from its rooftop terrace, Divani Palace Acropolis offers elegant rooms. It is walking distance from the new Acropolis museum and Herodion theatre. All with private furnished balconies, Divani Palace rooms are decorated in natural colours and feature classic furnishings. They are equipped with a TV with satellite and cable channels, air conditioning and safety box. Most offer spectacular views to the Acropolis and Philopappou Hill. A unique feature of the Divani Palace Acropolis hotel is the ancient ruins of Themistocles wall, discovered in the foundations during construction and tastefully incorporated in the hotel's architectural design. The rooftop restaurant Acropolis Secret is open during the summer season and serves Greek and international dishes. Aspassia, the main restaurant, offers Mediterranean cuisine and American breakfast in a stylish setting. The hotel can arrange a free shuttle bus to Syntagma Square during your stay. The Acropolis Metro Station is within 500 metres, while scenic Plaka is a 10-minute walk away.

name: Academias Hotel, Autograph Collection
description: Drawing inspiration from time-honored Athenian wisdom, Academias Hotel, Autograph Collection offers a one-of-a-kind backdrop for your visit to Greece's capital city. Perfectly situated in the heart of Athens' most renowned shopping district, we're within walking distance of the Acropolis and other legendary destinations. Our boutique hotel offers a modern interpretation of Plato’s Academy, designed to awaken the senses. You'll find yourself entranced by our elegant decor, which echoes ancient Greek architecture, in addition to the stunning contemporary design elements that exist throughout our luxury hotel. Every one of our 60 hotel rooms provides all you need to unwind after a day of excitement. Join us here in Athens, Greece to enjoy boutique amenities like a heated pool, a stylish lobby lounge, a rich breakfast experience at Symposium Restaurant, an all day bar lounge area Plato Bar and a unique culinary experience of Japanese fusion cuisine at NYX Rooftop Restaurant with spectacular view to Acropolis.Marriott

name: 18 Micon Street
description: 18 Micon Street is perfectly located for both business and leisure guests in Athens. The hotel offers guests a range of services and amenities designed to provide comfort and convenience. Take advantage of the hotel's free Wi-Fi in all rooms, daily housekeeping, postal service, taxi service, express check-in/check-out. Designed for comfort, selected guestrooms offer television LCD/plasma screen, complimentary instant coffee, complimentary tea, linens, mirror to ensure a restful night. The hotel offers various recreational opportunities. 18 Micon Street combines warm hospitality with a lovely ambiance to make your stay in Athens unforgettable.priceline.com

name: Civitel Attik Rooms & Suites
description: Civitel Attik provides a comfortable setting when in Athens. It also offers meeting rooms, an outdoor pool and free Wi-Fi. Guests can make the most of the sun on the terrace or have a drink at the bar. For those travelling with children Civitel Attik offers babysitting/child services. All rooms are air conditioned, soundproofed and equipped with a private balcony, a mini bar and a refrigerator. Each have slippers, converters/voltage adaptors and a private bathroom with a shower. In-house dining options include a restaurant, which is a convenient spot to enjoy a meal. There is a variety of breakfast options available each day. Civitel Attik is an ideal base to explore nearby Syntagma Square, as well as everything the local area has to offer. It is within walking distance of Marousi Metro Station and Nerantziotissa Train Station, which allows for convenient access in and around Athens.Revato

name: Art Hotel Athens
description: Set in a renovated 1930s building, this city centre boutique hotel has a small seasonal pool and offers stylish, air-conditioned accommodation with within walking distance of the National Theatre. Omonoia Metro Station is a 10-minute walk. The sophisticated rooms are distinctively designed and feature contemporary furniture which create an elegant atmosphere. Each is equipped with satellite/cable TV and a laptop safe. At the hotel’s cafeteria and elegantly furnished bar-restaurant, guests can relax with a drink or coffee and a light snack, or enjoy a full meal. The Hotel Athens Art features a large multi-purpose hall, hosting art exhibitions, galleries and conventions. Free Wi-Fi is available in public hotel areas. The Art Hotel Athens is within walking distance of the Archaeological Museum, the Acropolis, and the ancient Plaka district. The friendly staff of the Art Hotel Athens will be happy assist guests with tourist information, as well as book restaurants, organize sightseeing tours or suggest cultural events. Free maps are available.

name: Green Suites Boutique Hotel
description: Set in Athens, 4.8 km from Omonia Metro Station, Green Suites Boutique Hotel offers accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. This 5-star hotel offers room service and a concierge service. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, a shared lounge and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Every room is equipped with a kettle, while some rooms also offer a terrace and others also have city views. At Green Suites Boutique Hotel all rooms have bed linen and towels. The daily breakfast offers continental, Full English/Irish or Italian options. Larissis Railway Station is 5 km from the accommodation, while University of Athens - Central Building is 5.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Eleftherios Venizelos Airport, 29 km from Green Suites Boutique Hotel.

name: Athenian Residences
description: Athenian Residences is located in Athens, in the Athens City Centre district. The property is set 300 metres from Ancient Agora of Athens. Staff on site can arrange airport transfers. The units at the hotel come with a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom with free toiletries and a bath. Selected rooms will provide you with a kitchen with an oven and a toaster. Guest rooms will provide guests with a wardrobe and a coffee machine. Athenian Residences offers an outer plunge pool, while beauty services can be provided upon charge. A breakfast box is provided in the units daily. Ermou Street-Shopping Area is 300 metres from the accommodation. The nearest airport is Elefthérios Venizélos Airport, 33 km from the property.

name: Novotel Athenes
description: Novotel Athenes is the perfect hotel to live the authentic Greek experience in the heart of Athens. Relax and unwind in one of our 196 rooms. Food lovers will enjoy discovering international flavors at our restaurants. Savor 360° views of Athens and Acropolis from the roof terrace or re-energize in the gym and the outdoor pool during summer. For successful meetings, 8 flexible conference rooms will inspire you. Immerse yourself in Greek culture from our hotel near the city center, museums and monuments.accorhotels.com

name: Royal Olympic Hotel
description: A short walk from the Acropolis, 5-star Royal Olympic Hotel is located right in front of the Temple of Olympian Zeus and features an outdoor pool and a fitness centre. Guests can taste traditional Greek cuisine or enjoy a cocktail at the rooftop Ioannis bar-restaurant offering panoramic views over the Acropolis and Lycabettus Hill. The elegantly decorated rooms and suites at Royal Olympic are air conditioned and include a mini bar, hairdryer and bathroom amenities. Each soundproofed unit has a work desk, a satellite TV and a bathroom with shower or bathtub. Most units offers views over the Temple of Zeus or the swimming pool garden. Hotel facilities include 18 fully equipped meeting rooms, all flooded with natural light and accommodating up to 700 guests. Free WiFi access is provided throughout the hotel, while the multilingual staff is available 24/7. A library is also available on site. The Royal Olympic is within a 4-minute walk from the picturesque Plaka neighbourhood, where a variety of traditional restaurants and souvenirs shops is featured. Syntagma Square is 1 km away and Athens International Airport is at 35 km.

name: Theoxenia Residence
description: Theoxenia Residence is set in Kifisia, an exclusive suburb in Athens featuring high-end restaurants and boutiques. It offers an outdoor pool and on-site restaurant specialising in Greek and Italian cuisine. Its elegantly designed suites feature free WiFi. Boasting Athens and garden views, every suite at Theoxenia Residence includes a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Its marble bathrooms are stocked with a bath, while free toiletries are also offered. Air conditioning comes standard. The uniquely designed bar offers a selection of alluring cocktails and Mediterranean specialty wines. There is also a 24-hour front desk at the property. The world-renowned Acropolis and its magnificent museum are 12 km away. The Mall Athens and Golden Hall, the 2 major shopping malls of Athens, lie within 4 km and 5 km respectively. Athens International Airport is 29 km away.

name: St George Lycabettus Hotel
description: Nestled against the pine-forested slopes of Lycabettus Hill, the St. George Lycabettus Lifestyle Hotel affords breathtaking panoramic views over Athens to the Acropolis and the Saronic Gulf beyond. Guests are also perfectly positioned in the pulsing heart of Athens, just steps away from Kolonakis alluring shops, museums, galleries and eateries. Discover our elegant, family-friendly hotel in the center of the city the perfect place to experience all that Athens has to offer!iHotelier/iStay

name: Art Suites Korai
description: Located in Athens and with National Archaeological Museum of Athens reachable within 600 metres, Art Suites Korai provides express check-in and check-out, non-smoking rooms, a seasonal outdoor swimming pool and free WiFi. The property features a bar, as well as a restaurant serving Greek cuisine. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, room service and luggage storage for guests. Guest rooms at the hotel are equipped with a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a private bathroom with a hair dryer and a bath. All units at Art Suites Korai include air conditioning and a desk. A buffet breakfast is available daily at the accommodation. Popular points of interest near Art Suites Korai include National Theatre of Greece, Omonia Square and Monastiraki Flea Market. The nearest airport is Elefthérios Venizélos, 34 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service. Free off-site parking can be provided upon request and availability.

name: Athens Hawks Hostel
description: SOHO Hotel is conveniently located in the popular Psiri / Monastiraki area. The hotel offers a high standard of service and amenities to suit the individual needs of all travelers. 24-hour room service, Wi-Fi in public areas, car park, room service, family room are just some of the facilities on offer. Guestrooms are designed to provide an optimal level of comfort with welcoming decor and some offering convenient amenities like television LCD/plasma screen, non smoking rooms, air conditioning, heating, wake-up service. The hotel offers various recreational opportunities. Discover all Athens has to offer by making SOHO Hotel your base.priceline.com
